Classes in metaface.embodiment used by metaface.client
DrawingArea
          DrawingArea is a double buffered panel that captures paint calls and executes the MPEG-4Face.drawFace method
IdleBehaviour
          This class defines the idle behaviour to be used by a MetaFace application.
MPEG4Face
          Abstract class that provides interface for classes to construct MPEG-4 faces
